title: 7.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
The table below shows the favorite color of 100 kids in a school.

(1) Enter the data in an Excel fi le. Save it in the Documents folder with the name Favorite color.
(2) Generate a bar graph for the given data.
(3) Which color is the most favorite and which color is the least favorite? _________________
(4) How many kids chose red as their favorite color? ________________.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
